parent.description: The parent block of the current block.

id.description: The unique identifier of the block.

created_time.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

created_by.description: The user who created the block.

last_edited_by.description: The user who last edited the block.

last_edited_time.description: The timestamp when the block was last edited.

archived.description: Indicates if the block is archived or not.

has_children.description: Indicates if the block has children or not.

bookmark.description: Represents a bookmark within the block

caption.description: The caption associated with the bookmark.

bulleted_list_item.description: Represents an item in a bulleted list.

callout.description: Describes a callout message or content in the block

color.description: The color of the callout element.

rich_text.description: Rich text content within the callout.

icon.description: The icon associated with the callout.

code.description: Contains code snippets or blocks in the block content

caption.description: The caption associated with the code block.

rich_text.description: Rich text content within the code block.

language.description: The programming language used in the code block.

embed.description: Contains embedded content such as videos, tweets, etc.

url.description: The URL of the embedded content.

equation.description: Represents an equation or mathematical formula in the block

expression.description: The mathematical expression in the block.

link_preview.description: Displays a preview of an external link within the block

url.description: The URL of the link preview.

link_to_page.description: Provides a link to another page within the block

page_id.description: The ID of the linked page.

type.description: The type of the linked page.

numbered_list_item.description: Represents an item in a numbered list.

synced_block.description: Represents a block synced from another source

synced_from.description: Details about the source block being synced from

type.description: The type of the block synced from.

block_id.description: The ID of the block synced from.

children.description: Children blocks synced with the current block.

table.description: Represents a table within the block

has_column_header.description: Indicates if the table has column headers.

has_row_header.description: Indicates if the table has row headers.

table_of_contents.description: Contains information regarding the table of contents

color.description: The color of the table of contents.

table_row.description: Represents a row in a table within the block

cells.description: Contains the cell data for the row

items.description: The content of each cell in the table row.

template.description: Specifies a template used within the block

rich_text.description: Rich text content within the template block.

to_do.description: Represents a to-do list or task content

rich_text.description: Rich text associated with the to-do item

items.description: Rich text content within the to-do block.

checked.description: Indicates if the to-do item is checked.

color.description: The color associated with the to-do item.

children.description: Child elements within the to-do list

items.description: Nested child items of the to-do block.
